scripts.serve: npm run kill:emulators && npm run java -- npx firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions,firestore --config ../../firebase.json
scripts.shell: npm run java -- npx firebase-tools functions:shell --config ../../firebase.json
scripts.deploy: npm run java -- npx firebase-tools deploy --only functions --config ../../firebase.json
scripts.logs: npm run java -- npx firebase-tools functions:log --config ../../firebase.json
scripts.export:emulator: npm run java -- npx firebase-tools emulators:export ../.emulator-data/firestore --config ../../firebase.json --project pletcher-portfolio-app
scripts.seed:download: EXPORT_PREFIX=${EXPORT_PREFIX:-gs://pletcher-portfolio-app.firebasestorage.app/firestore-exports} && LATEST=$(gsutil ls -d "$EXPORT_PREFIX/*" | tail -n 1) && echo "Downloading: $LATEST" && rm -rf ../emulator-data/firestore && mkdir -p ../emulator-data/firestore && gsutil -m cp -r "$LATEST" ../emulator-data/firestore/
scripts.serve:import: npm run kill:emulators && (test -d ../emulator-data/firestore && test "$(ls -A ../emulator-data/firestore 2>/dev/null)" || npm run seed:download) && IMPORT_DIR=$(npm run -s import:path) && echo "Importing Firestore from: $IMPORT_DIR" && npm run java -- npx firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions,firestore --config ../../firebase.json --project pletcher-portfolio-app --import "$IMPORT_DIR" --export-on-exit "$IMPORT_DIR"
